color: Beige with Wood Grain, White, Black, Light Wood
key_features: Front view displaying drivers and brand name; back view showing connection terminals and mounting options; various sizes including floor-standing, bookshelf, and center channel speakers.
description: The images depict a collection of DALI speakers, including the Sonik model in beige with wood grain, white, and black colors, as well as the Oberon Series in light wood, white, and black. All speakers appear to be in new condition with no visible damage or wear. The set includes different types of speakers such as floor-standing, bookshelf, and center channel models.
